Reviews.Title: “The spot to stay in OC”
Reviews.Author: D722
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel august 2009 unsure look pleasntly surprised staff super friendly checkin smoothly boardwalk 2nd floor comfy bed normal sized hotel bathroom clean clean romantic hotel kid friendly pool size clean deck outside rocking chairs till midnight people watcher nice sit check boarwalk watch people rides park beach morning stay enter guest entrance showers clean enter hotel stay planning summer staying
